==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== {{prefix|de|vor|Mittag}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈfoːɐ̯.mɪˌtaːk/}} {{i|standard}} * {{IPA|de|/ˈfɔɐ̯.mɪˌtax/}} {{i|northern and central Germany; chiefly colloquial}} * {{audio|de|De-Vormittag.ogg|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Vormittags|gen2=Vormittages|Vormittage}} # [[mid]]-[[morning]], [[late]] morning, [[forenoon]] {{gloss|time of day roughly between 9 a.m. and noon}} =====Declension===== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|e}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|Morgen}} {{i|more general}} ====See also==== * {{l|de|Tag}} * {{l|de|Mittag}} * {{l|de|Nachmittag}} * {{l|de|Abend}} * {{l|de|Nacht}} * {{l|de|Mitternacht}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Times of day]]
